doctor.name: Prof. Dr. A.K.M. Kamruzzaman
doctor.specialty: Blood Diseases, Blood Cancer & Hematology Specialist
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. A.K.M. Kamruzzaman is a Hematologist in Rangpur. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Hematology). He is a Professor & Head, Hematology at Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Dr. Amanullah Diagnostic Center, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. A.K.M. Kamruzzaman at Dr. Amanullah Diagnostic Center, Rangpur is 5pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Abdul Kader Zilani
doctor.specialty: Blood Cancer, Blood Diseases & Hematology Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Abdul Kader Zilani is a Hematologist in Rangpur. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Hematology). He is a Associate Professor, Hematology at Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Quality Diagnostic Center, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Abdul Kader Zilani at Quality Diagnostic Center, Rangpur is 3pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Dhap, R. K. Road, Rangpur (Opposite to cantonment public school)

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Najmul Karim
doctor.specialty: Hematology (Blood Disorders, Blood Cancer, Thalassemia) Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Najmul Karim is a Hematologist in Rangpur. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Hematology). He is a Assistant Professor, Hematology at Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Hypertension & Research Center, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Najmul Karim at Hypertension & Research Center, Rangpur is 4pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Holding No: 13/2, Hypertension Centre Lane, Dhap, Jail Road, Rangpur

doctor.name: Dr. Md Mahamudul Hasan
doctor.info: Dr. Md Mahamudul Hasan is a Hematologist in Rangpur. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Hematology). He is a Registrar, Hematology at Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center 1, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Dr. Md Mahamudul Hasan at Popular Diagnostic Center 1, Rangpur is 3:30pm to 10:00pm (Everyday).

chamber.address: Room No. 501, 4th Floor, Dhap Jail Road, Rangpur
